title: Best of The Herd: 12/31/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/31/2019
description:
Colin celebrates New Years Eve by giving sports athletes, teams and owners some well needed New Years Resolutions to benefit their upcoming futures! Ron Rivera is making a huge mistake by taking the open head coaching position with the Washington Redskins, Jason Garrett is much harder to fire than you think he is since nice people are tougher to let go than tough guys, and Instant Replay has made everything from jersey pulling to tackles look way worse and harder to judge. Plus, the last Herd Hierarchy of 2019!


Guest: Bucky Brooks

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
